description.@en: There’s always something left to do during the day, some tasks left incomplete.

system.notes:
Commoner Trait

Professions of this Archetype are typically run-of-the-mill people, taking on regular jobs. Their occupations may vary by culture, but they live by the philosophy that hard work will ensure a bountiful, healthy and productive life.

effect.@en: You do not suffer the ill-effects of Peril until you are at ‘Ignore 3 Skill Ranks’ on the Peril Condition Track.
